data.title: Viby Poovathingal - Network Engineer
data.meta_description: View the professional profile of Viby Poovathingal, a seasoned Network Engineer with over 17 years, 10 Months of experience, on Bayt.com.
data.text:
Network Engineer at Joyalukkas Corporate Office

United Arab Emirates - Dubai

My current job since September 2011

Joyalukkas Group (International operations)

Responsibilities & Experience

 Manage large and small IT projects, which includes structured cabling, CCTV, Access controls, Burglar alarm and telecommunication.

 Design and implement network infrastructure, disaster recovery, load balancing and high availability over disparate Internet links.

 Reviewing bids from the contractors/vendors and controlling costs by approving expenditure and assign right personals at right phases of the projects.

 Manage a team of Desktop support and CCTV Technicians

 Experience in managing different models of FortiGate firewalls, Cisco/ubiquiti Switches, Cisco meraki/ engenius/ ubiquity Access Points.

 Experience in administration of Hyper-V and VMWare

 Experience in managing large network operations which includes VLAN, LAN, WLAN, WAN, Firewalls, Routing, Switching and Wifi

 Experience in providing uninterrupted VPN connectivity (IPSec, SSL) for more than 100 locations which include the branches, external users and other banking, financial, Airline, government sectors for the smooth operation of the ERP, CRM, Loyalty programs and the APIs for the data center.

 Managing an email system on G-suit and an email archive server on premise.

 Hands on experience in configuring and maintaining Avaya IP Office and the utilization of full capabilities of IP Based PABX resulted in reducing the telecommunication cost up to 50%

 Hands on Experience in developing and maintaining a LOG Management system using Asp.net, c#, MySql server 5 and css.

 Administering fire fighting and fire alarm contractor contacts

 Travel all over GCC, Singapore, Malaysia, UK and other Branches in case of major issues related to IT and for the new projects.

 Ensure all operating systems are updated with the latest patches, fully licensed and protected with centralized endpoint protection.

 Purchase and procurement for IT in different countries which includes GCC, UK, KSA, USA, Singapore and Malaysia

Network Engineer at Joyalukkas India Pvt Ltd

India

August 2008 to September 2011

 Configure and Maintain a Mesh mode routing for more than 35 Locations with

Linux based router and FortiGate Firewalls

 Interact with the Internet Service Providers for ILL, ADSL etc

 Configuring and managing the core switching and routing

 Symantec Endpoint Security - Maintain all Branches Centralized (Antivirus

updating, Device locking, Policies, Application Control etc...)

 Maintain the File Servers, Domain Controllers, Active Directory, Backups, NAS

 Supervised 2 CCTV Technicians

 Maintain LAN, WLAN, WAN, VPN, Print Servers etc of Branches all over India

 Remote Administration - Solving day today problems(Servers, Networking,

Softwares, Virus removal, WinXP, WIN2000, WIN2003, Printers and Hardware

related issues of all branches

 Administering more than 40 IBM Servers (x225, x226 series, IBM system

x3400 M3, 3200 M2 etc)of different locations all over India

 Computer Hardware maintenance of desktops, laptops and server graded

machines
